Follow these instructions:

Hey! I'll be heading to Paris soon. Can you suggest a hotel, a car rental company, and a restaurant with the best ratings? I'm looking for the best options that are also budget-friendly.

I will first find the best-rated hotel, car rental company, and restaurant in Paris. Then, I will find out the prices for each of these and calculate the minimum cost for a 3-day trip, including two meals a day at the restaurant.

Good Night
Luxury Palace
Montmartre Suites
